comment: Prof. Chang changed my opinion of math classes. I had previously failed stat and I ended up with an A. He explains the material in a way that is easy to understand and if you attend class he sends you the notes. His tests are long but if you do the reviews and listen to what he's saying and apply it, you will do fine!

I'm so surpised the reviews are so long for Mr. Chang. He was so helpful. He always stayed after class to clear up anything I didn't understand. He provides the formulas, so no worries about memorizing them. Plus he doesn't require that $100+ calulator. He even gives you awesome reviews exactly like his tests.

Professor Chang is the best for this course. Attending class helps a lot because he only emails notes to the people that go to class. Do the test reviews and you will be fine! He is also available for help after class if you ask for it.

He can't teach to save his life so you HAVE to read in order to pass. It's not a difficult class if you do a lot of work on your own, but don't expect to learn the info in class. I would avoid this proffessor at all cost. I I'll never take one of his classes again.

I don't understand why Professor Chang has such low reviews. All you  need know going in how add, subtract, multiply, divide, and PEMDAS, simple arithmetic. He makes it really easy because he gives you the formula AND you don't have to calculate everything. He is one of the nicest Professors I have ever met and is funny and has a great personality.

He has no clue how to teach. I'm good at math, but if you run out of time on a test, he won't give you time to finish it he just grades everything wrong. I got a 70 on a test because he wouldn't let me finish a page, worth 10+  points. Bottom line, don't take him.

I don't know why Dr. Chang has such bad reviews. I currently have 105% in his class. All you have to do is show up to class for attendance ( dont worry about now understanding his lecture because if you go over the review he sends out before a test you will get a 100 on the test) . His reviews are helpful, he is helpful and I recommend him.

I learn nothing in his lectures. He doesn't teach the equations, but instead reads through powerpoints like the class already knows what they are doing. However, if you go to class he emails you the notes and study guide. If you put effort in outside of class you should be ok, but you should try to avoid if possible.
terrible professor. not helpful at all. don't take him if you can avoid him. try another professor. there are many good ones at this university.

Terrible experience with this professor. Made it difficult to learn. Unhelpful and talking about his greatness. I would not recommend him to my worst enemy. Stay away from his class if you care about getting the education you need.
TERRIBLE TERRIBLE AWFUL EXPERIENCE. I had even taken another stat class in high school and had extreme difficulty grasping concepts that simply built upon my previous knowledge. AVOID IF YOU CAN!

I just ended up dropping this class. He was awful and I cannot teach myself statistics. Will have to take it over the summer. He seems like a nice guy but has no idea what he is doing. Maybe other people will have better luck but I didn't see myself doing well in his class.
Terrible. Avoid him if you can!

All the students in the class gave him a hard time because it was his first semester teaching but in all honesty he was the best professor i have had at kennesaw. He doesn't explain problems in class very well but as long as you do your study guide and attend class you will get an easy A. He makes everything very easy and straight to the point.

I am generally good at math and I suffered. He does not work out problems as examples, just talks about them. He gets an attitude when student's suggest a more helpful way of learning or reviewing. He is not very efficient and I could not tell you one single thing I learned from his class. Do not recommend at all.

This was his first semester teaching and unfortunately the class suffered. I am good at math so I'm doing well but a lot are struggling. He is very willing to help you improve your grade if you go to class though. He is just very unorganized and doesn't know how to solve problems with TI 84. Got better as class went on, still difficult.
